tacticulous.tira.ai

Class ArtificialIntelligence

  • java.lang.Object
    • tacticulous.tira.ai.ArtificialIntelligence

  • public class ArtificialIntelligence
extends Object
    ROBOT APOCALYPSE class: contains and provides access to most elements used by the game. I apologize for the stupid naming non-conventions.
    Author:
    O

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArtificialIntelligence

        public ArtificialIntelligence(Game gateway,
                      Player amIAlive,
                      int turnsToSimulate,
                      int randomness,
                      int aggression,
                      int defensiveness)
        Parameters:
        gateway - provides access to necessary data
        amIAlive - the player who this AI is.
        turnsToSimulate - how many successive turns the AI simulates. Note that values above 2 (or even 1) are at the moment horribly slow. Exponential growth, etc.
        randomness - additive; randomly modifies the value of actions, to increase unpredictability.
        aggression - multiplier; increases the value of offensive actions.
        defensiveness - multiplier; increases the value of defensive actions.

                             BattleMap theMatrix)
        Makes AI copies of a player's units, uncluding current action status (notMoved, etc).
        Parameters:
        player - units from here
        Returns:
        also includes units not in players currentlyActiveUnits
